SQL.LOAD: SELECT product_code_id, reward_name, prod_reward_id, reward_type, reward_amount, min_purchase_price, days_to_redeem, effective_date, expiration_date, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_prod_rewards WHERE prod_reward_id = :prod_reward_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select PR.PROD_REWARD_ID, PC.Product_Code_id, PR.REWARD_NAME, PR.REWARD_TYPE, PR.REWARD_AMOUNT, PR.min_purchase_price, PR.DAYS_TO_REDEEM, PR.EFFECTIVE_DATE, PR.Expiration_Date, PR.created_date, PR.created_by, PR.modified_date, PR.modified_by From ELITA.ELP_PROD_REWARDS PR, ELITA.elp_product_code PC WHERE pr.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id and pc.product_code_id = :product_code_id
SQL.VALIDATE_UNIQUE_COMBINATION: Select effective_date,expiration_date from elp_prod_rewards pr, elp_product_code pc where pr.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id and pc.product_code_id = :product_code_id and pr.reward_type = :reward_type and pr.effective_date = :effective_date and pr.expiration_date = :expiration_date
SQL.VALIDATE_OVERLAPPING: Select effective_date,expiration_date from elp_prod_rewards pr, elp_product_code pc where pr.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id and pc.product_code_id = :product_code_id and pr.reward_type = :reward_type and ((:effective_date between pr.effective_date and pr.expiration_date) or (:expiration_date between pr.effective_date and pr.expiration_date))
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE ELP_PROD_REWARDS SET product_code_id = :product_code_id, reward_name = :reward_name, prod_reward_id = :prod_reward_id, reward_type = :reward_type, reward_amount = :reward_amount, min_purchase_price = :min_purchase_price, days_to_redeem = :days_to_redeem, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE prod_reward_id = :prod_reward_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO ELP_PROD_REWARDS ( product_code_id, reward_name, prod_reward_id, reward_type, reward_amount, min_purchase_price, days_to_redeem, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by ) VALUES ( :product_code_id, :reward_name, :prod_reward_id, :reward_type, :reward_amount, :min_purchase_price, :days_to_redeem, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by )
